overview:
Potenzone is a seasoned technologist with a focus on startups and early stage companies. His experience includes hands on and executive roles in application development and programming, data center and security operations as well as business development and sales. Potenzone is currently the VP of US Sales for the eCommerce provider Avangate. Previously he served as CIO of Uniloc, VP of Operations at Relegence, Technical Director at MTV as well as having served in various consulting roles within oil, banking and entertainment. He continues to provide consulting services to a variety of organizations as well as providing expert witness testimony in the area of digital media.

At any point Potenzone has at least one to two companies or products bubbling on the back burner. To date he has been awarded two patents as primary inventor, an inventor on three others and has several additional provisional and in process patent applications. Potenzone is a product manager and developer at heart and is constantly pushing the envelope new technologies.

milestones.description: Joined Uniloc as Director of Technology and Development and subsequently promoted to CIO.
Joined arvato usa as Director, Web Technologies.  Responsible for a variety of web based programs from conception, development, sale and deployment.
